kotlin.io
Extensions on java.net.URL

extension functions on class java.net.URL
from package kotlin.io

Function Summary
fun URL readBytes(): ByteArray
Reads the entire content of the URL as bytes
fun URL readText(encoding: Charset): String
Reads the entire content of the URL as a String with the specified character encoding.
fun URL readText( [encoding: String]): String
Reads the entire content of the URL as a String with a character set name

Reads the entire content of the URL as bytes

This method is not recommended on huge files.
